original_text: Then Jehoshaphat bowed his head with his face to the ground, and all Judah and the inhabitants of Jerusalem fell down before the Lord, worshiping the Lord.
korean_text: 여호사밧이 몸을 굽혀 얼굴을 땅에 대니 온 유다와 예루살렘 주민들도 여호와 앞에 엎드려 여호와께 경배하고

sentences.original_text: Then Jehoshaphat bowed his head with his face to the ground
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 여호사밧은 얼굴을 땅에 대고 엎드렸습니다

sentences.original_text: and all Judah and the inhabitants of Jerusalem fell down before the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 유다와 예루살렘 거민 모두가 주 앞에 엎드렸습니다
